Posts.Content: lynnmarie58 wrote: I am wondering how long after a double mastectomy with the expander's inserted at the same time is it before the "severe burning sensation" across the chest goes away.  The pain from the expander's is one thing but the constant feeling like the skin has a severe burn is worse.  I have the same burning sensation down the right arm which I am told is from the sentinel lymph nodes being removed and that hurts to touch too.  The reconstruction surgeon told me the feeling down the arm is nerve damage and that I should softly rub lotion on it periodically to "re-train" the brain to realize I am only touching my arm and not trying to tear the skin off. I am guessing the sensation across the chest is nerves as well but am wondering how long before it subsides. Log in to post a reply
